footer.desc: Proclaiming the sovereign grace of God, committed to the 1689 London Baptist Confession of Faith.

home.solas_banner: Sola Gratia • Sola Fide • Sola Scriptura • Sola Christus • Sola Deo Gloria
home.hero_desc: A community of believers dedicated to the glory of God through expository preaching, vibrant worship, and loving fellowship.
home.sunday_worship_desc: Join us for the Lord's Day service.
home.evening_service_desc: A time of prayer and teaching.
home.welcome_text_1: We are a Reformed Baptist church located in the heart of Hawassa, Ethiopia. We believe in the authority of Scripture, the sovereignty of God in salvation, and the centrality of the local church.
home.welcome_text_2: Whether you are a long-time believer or just asking questions about faith, we invite you to join us as we seek to know Christ and make Him known.

about.title: Who We Are
about.subtitle: Rooted in history, relevant for today.
about.confession_text: We fully subscribe to the <1>1689 London Baptist Confession of Faith</1>. We believe it is the best summary of what the Bible teaches.
about.total_depravity_desc: Man is completely dead in sin and unable to save himself.
about.unconditional_election_desc: God chose His people before the foundation of the world, not based on any foreseen merit.
about.limited_atonement_desc: Christ died specifically and effectually for the elect, securing their salvation.
about.irresistible_grace_desc: The Holy Spirit effectually calls the elect to faith, overcoming their resistance.
about.perseverance_saints_desc: Those whom God has chosen and Christ has redeemed will remain in faith until the end.
about.sola_scriptura_desc: The Scriptures are the only sufficient, certain, and infallible rule of all saving knowledge, faith, and obedience.
about.sovereign_grace_desc: Salvation is entirely of God's grace, not human merit.
about.believers_baptism_desc: Baptism is for those who profess repentance towards God and faith in our Lord Jesus Christ.
about.regulative_principle_desc: We worship God only as He has commanded in Scripture.
about.local_membership_desc: Meaningful accountability and love among members.
about.elder_desc: Faithfully serving HRBC since 20XX. Committed to shepherding the flock with instructions from the Word.
about.deacon_desc: Serving the physical needs of the body and maintaining the church property.
about.history_text: Hawassa Reformed Baptist Church was planted in [Year] with a burden to see a biblical church established in this city. Starting as a small Bible study in a living room, God has faithfully grown us into a congregation that loves His Word. We continue to look forward to how God will use us to spread the Gospel in Hawassa and beyond.

ministries.title: Ministries
ministries.subtitle: Serving the Body, Reaching the Lost
ministries.mens_desc: Equipping men to be spiritual leaders in their homes and the church through prayer, study, and accountability.
ministries.womens_desc: Encouraging women to grow in Titus 2 godliness through fellowship and studying the Word together.
ministries.sunday_school_desc: Systematic theology and Bible survey classes for all ages before the main worship service.
ministries.evangelism_desc: Taking the Gospel to the streets of Hawassa. We believe in the power of the Gospel to save.

contact.header_subtitle: We would love to hear from you.
contact.contact_intro: Whether you have a question about our beliefs, need prayer, or want to know more about our service times, please don't hesitate to reach out.

solas.title: The Five Solas
solas.subtitle: These five truths summarize the biblical theology of the Reformation and our foundation as a church.
solas.scriptura_desc: The Bible is our highest authority.
solas.fide_desc: We are saved through faith, not works.
solas.gratia_desc: Salvation is a gift of God's grace.
solas.christus_desc: Jesus is the only mediator directly.
solas.gloria_desc: Our lives are for God's glory.

sermons.title: Sermons
sermons.subtitle: Proclaiming the whole counsel of God.
